uvi.description:
scsi: advansys: Fix kernel pointer leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.162 by commit cc248790bfdcf879e3094fa248c85bf92cdf9dae. For more details please see the references link.
